what: R: The open statistical computing project
title: A Package for a Workshop on Exploratory Data Analysis
text: R? R open-source language statistical computing. created early 1990s Ross Ihaka Robert Gentleman University Auckland, New Zealand, way provide students accessible, -cost statistical application courses. R now maintained R Development Core Team, continues developed hundreds contributors around globe. R attractive alternative software packages data analysis (e.g., Microsoft Excel, Matlab, Stata, ArcGIS) due open-source character (.e., free), flexibility, large user community. size R community means something want (instance, estimate linear regression model plot geographical information), likely someone already developed package R. good way think R core package, library optional packages can attached increase core functionality. R can downloaded free : https://cran.rstudio.com/ R comes built-console (graphical user interface), better alternatives basic interface include Interactive Development Environments like RStudio, can also downloaded free: https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/ R requires work using command line, going unfamiliar many accustomed user-friendly graphical interfaces. fear. what: A qualitative survey on Ph.D. entrepreneurship in Italy. — phd_italy
title: A qualitative survey on Ph.D. entrepreneurship in Italy. — phd_italy
text: Data survey Ph.D. (Doctor Philosophy) entrepreneurship Italy. data includes () information Ph.D. students graduate 2008 2014; (ii) background information Italian academic institutions attended students. database includes responses 906 students. Students provided information employment condition, family background opinions Ph.D. course institution attended. Information regional characteristics university policies also included.
